patterns: What types of loans do you offer?
responses: We offer Personal Loans, Home Loans, Education Loans, and Business Loans. Which one are you interested in?
Our personal loans offer flexible repayment terms, competitive interest rates, and fast approval. Would you like to check eligibility?

patterns: Can I get a housing loan?
responses: Our home loans are available for purchasing, constructing, or renovating your house. Let me help you with the requirements.

patterns: Can I get a loan for studies?
responses: Yes, our education loans cover tuition and other expenses for local or international studies.
Interest rates vary depending on the loan type and applicant profile. Would you like to talk to a loan officer for personalized info?

patterns: Am I eligible for a loan?
How do I know if I qualify?
responses: Eligibility depends on your income, employment status, and credit history. You can check eligibility online or visit a branch.
You'll generally need your NIC, salary slips, bank statements, and proof of address. The exact documents vary by loan type.
You can apply online via our website or visit your nearest HNB branch. Would you like the online application link?
You can call our customer service at 011-246-0000 or email us at info@hnb.lk
Please visit https://www.hnb.lk/branches to find your nearest branch.

patterns: How much will I pay monthly?
responses: You can use our loan calculator here: https://www.hnb.lk/loan-calculator to estimate your monthly payments.

patterns: What credit score do I need?
responses: Yes, credit score is an important factor. A good score improves your chances of approval and getting better interest rates.

patterns: How can I repay my loan?
responses: You can repay your loan via direct debit, online banking, mobile app, or at any HNB branch.

patterns: What happens if I miss a loan payment?
responses: Missing a payment may lead to penalties or affect your credit score. Please contact our loan support team at 011-246-0000 as soon as possible.
Loan renewals or term extensions are possible based on your repayment history. Visit your branch or call us to discuss your options.
Some loans require collateral while others are unsecured. Personal and education loans are usually unsecured. Let us know which loan type you're interested in.

patterns: Do you have a mobile app?
How can I download the app?
responses: Yes! Download the HNB SOLO app from the App Store or Google Play to access banking services anytime, anywhere.
Top-up options are available based on your repayment record. Visit a branch or speak with your loan officer to check your eligibility.

patterns: Do I need insurance for the loan?
responses: Some loans include insurance for added security. It helps cover repayments in case of emergencies. Your loan officer can explain the details.

patterns: Do you support Sinhala or Tamil?
responses: Yes, you can talk to us in Sinhala, Tamil, or English. We are here to help in your preferred language.

patterns: When will I get the loan?
responses: Loan approval usually takes 2-5 working days, depending on the loan type and document verification.

patterns: Can I take a loan for travel?
responses: Yes, you can take personal loans for travel, weddings, medical expenses, or other needs. Just let us know the purpose when applying.
You can check your loan status through your HNB online account or by contacting your loan officer.
